original_text: The leaders gave money to men who could work with stone and wood. They sent food, drink and olive oil to the people in Tyre and Sidon. This was to pay for beams of wood from cedar trees. They would bring the wood from Lebanon on ships that came to Joppa. Cyrus, king of Persia, had commanded them to do this.
korean_text: 이에 석수와 목수에게 돈을 주고 또 시돈 사람과 두로 사람에게 먹을 것과 마실 것과 기름을 주고 바사 왕 고레스의 명령대로 백향목을 레바논에서 욥바 해변까지 운송하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: to men who could work with stone and wood
sentences.korean_translation: 돌과 나무로 일할 수 있는 사람들에게

sentences.original_text: They sent food, drink and olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 음식과 마실 것과 올리브 기름을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: to the people in Tyre and Sidon
This was to pay for beams of wood
They would bring the wood from Lebanon
on ships that came to Joppa
had commanded them to do this
